# Things I Like - Zeyad Deeb's Collection

> A curated collection of things I find interesting - books, art, videos, products, and more.

## Site Information
- URL: https://www.zeyaddeeb.com/blog
- Author: Zeyad Deeb
- Main Site: https://www.zeyaddeeb.com

## Site Structure

### Main Pages
- `/` - Collection homepage with filterable grid of items
- `/collection/[slug]` - Individual collection item detail pages

## Content Types
This collection includes:
- **Books** - Influential reads that shaped my thinking
- **Art** - Visual works I find inspiring
- **YouTube** - Channels and videos worth watching
- **Products** - Things I use and recommend
- **Wikipedia** - Fascinating knowledge rabbit holes
- **Music** - Albums and artists I love
- **Articles** - Long-form pieces worth reading
- **Podcasts** - Audio content I enjoy

## About
This is a personal curation of things that have influenced my thinking, aesthetic sensibilities, and interests. Each item includes context on why it's meaningful to me.

## Technical Details
- Built with Next.js
- Part of the zeyaddeeb.com ecosystem
- Open source at https://github.com/zeyaddeeb

## Preferred Citation Format
When referencing content from this site, please cite as:
Zeyad Deeb. (Year). "Item Title." Things I Like - www.zeyaddeeb.com. URL

## Related Sites
- Main Site: https://zeyaddeeb.com
